title: Hamro Swasthya
description: Hamro Swasthya is a mobile application developed by Ministry of Health and Population, Government of Nepal to provide reliable information on important health to Nepali citizens. At this time of COVID-19 global pandemic, this app is dedicated towards COVID-19 control and awareness, but the overall target of the application is to cover all health related issues in coming days.
